projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Manage your construction projects, track progress, and monitor budgets
projects.createProjectDescription: Create a new construction project to track progress and manage resources.
projects.searchPlaceholder: Search projects by name or address...

empty.title: No projects found
empty.description: Get started by creating your first construction project

projects.uploadTip: Click to upload or drag and drop (PNG, JPG, GIF, WebP up to 5MB)
projects.createDescription: Fill in details to add a new construction project

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.welcome: Welcome back! Here's what's happening with your construction projects.
dashboard.projectsOverview: Overview of your active construction projects
dashboard.createFirstProject: Create your first project to get started
dashboard.realTimeActivityLogs: Real-time activity logs will be available here

dailyLogs.title: Daily Logs
dailyLogs.subtitle: Manage construction site daily reports and progress

validation.requireTasks: Please select at least one task
validation.requireMedia: Please upload at least one media file

create.title: Create Daily Log
create.notesPlaceholder: Describe the work progress, issues, and observations...
create.mediaHint: Click 'Add Media' to upload photos or videos
create.mediaWarning: Please add at least one media item before submitting
create.successDesc: Your daily log has been saved as draft
create.submittedDesc: Your daily log has been submitted for PM review
create.mediaUploadedDesc: Media has been added to your log
create.engineerOnly: Only engineers can create daily logs

submitted.title: Submitted Logs for Review
submitted.noLogsHint: Logs will appear here when engineers submit them for review
submitted.approveSuccessDesc: The daily log has been approved
submitted.declineSuccessDesc: The daily log has been declined
submitted.pmOnly: Only project managers can review logs

approved.title: Approved Logs
approved.placeholder: Approved logs will be displayed here

qc.title: Quality Control Rating
qc.noLogs: No approved logs available for QC rating
qc.noLogsHint: Logs will appear here after PM approval
qc.rateQuality: Rate the quality of this work
qc.adminOnly: Only admins can provide QC ratings
qc.adminOnlyHint: Only admins can provide QC ratings

review.approveDesc: This log will be marked as approved and available for QC rating.
review.declineDesc: This log will be declined and returned to the engineer for revision.
review.declinePlaceholder: Please explain why this log is being declined...
review.approvePlaceholder: Add any additional comments or feedback...
review.commentHint: A comment is required when declining a log
